map₂_span_span:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem map₂_span_span (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (s : Set M) (t : Set N) :
    map₂ f (span R s) (span R t) = span R (Set.image2 (fun m n => f m n) s t) :=
  by
  apply le_antisymm
  · rw [map₂_le]
    intro a ha b hb
    apply span_induction ha
    on_goal 1 =>
      intros ; apply span_induction hb
      on_goal 1 => intros ; exact subset_span ⟨_, _, ‹_›, ‹_›, rfl⟩
    all_goals
      intros
      simp only [LinearMap.map_zero, LinearMap.zero_apply, zero_mem, LinearMap.map_add, LinearMap.add_apply,
        LinearMap.map_smul, LinearMap.smul_apply]
    all_goals
      solve_by_elim (config :=
        { max_depth := 4
          discharger := tactic.interactive.apply_instance }) [add_mem _ _, zero_mem _, smul_mem _ _ _]
  · rw [span_le]
    rintro _ ⟨a, b, ha, hb, rfl⟩
    exact apply_mem_map₂ _ (subset_span ha) (subset_span hb)
#align map₂_span_span map₂_span_span

theorem map₂_span_singleton_eq_map_flip (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (s : Submodule R M) (n : N) :
    map₂ f s (span R {n}) = map (f.flip n) s := by rw [← map₂_span_singleton_eq_map, map₂_flip]
#align map₂_span_singleton_eq_map_flip map₂_span_singleton_eq_map_flip
map₂_span_singleton_eq_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem map₂_span_singleton_eq_map (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (m : M) :
    map₂ f (span R {m}) = map (f m) := by
  funext; rw [map₂_eq_span_image2]; apply le_antisymm
  · rw [span_le, Set.image2_subset_iff]
    intro x hx y hy
    obtain ⟨a, rfl⟩ := mem_span_singleton.1 hx
    rw [f.map_smul]
    exact smul_mem _ a (mem_map_of_mem hy)
  · rintro _ ⟨n, hn, rfl⟩
    exact subset_span ⟨m, n, mem_span_singleton_self m, hn, rfl⟩
#align map₂_span_singleton_eq_map map₂_span_singleton_eq_map

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem map₂_le_map₂_right {f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)} {p : Submodule R M} {q₁ q₂ : Submodule R N}
    (h : q₁ ≤ q₂) : map₂ f p q₁ ≤ map₂ f p q₂ :=
  map₂_le_map₂ (le_refl p) h
#align map₂_le_map₂_right map₂_le_map₂_right

theorem map₂_le_map₂_left {f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)} {p₁ p₂ : Submodule R M} {q : Submodule R N}
    (h : p₁ ≤ p₂) : map₂ f p₁ q ≤ map₂ f p₂ q :=

@[mono]
theorem map₂_le_map₂ {f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)} {p₁ p₂ : Submodule R M} {q₁ q₂ : Submodule R N}
    (hp : p₁ ≤ p₂) (hq : q₁ ≤ q₂) : map₂ f p₁ q₁ ≤ map₂ f p₂ q₂ :=
  map₂_le.2 fun m hm n hn => apply_mem_map₂ _ (hp hm) (hq hn)

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem map₂_le {f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)} {p : Submodule R M} {q : Submodule R N}
    {r : Submodule R P} : map₂ f p q ≤ r ↔ ∀ m ∈ p, ∀ n ∈ q, f m n ∈ r :=
  ⟨fun H m hm n hn => H <| apply_mem_map₂ _ hm hn, fun H =>
    supᵢ_le fun ⟨m, hm⟩ => map_le_iff_le_comap.2 fun n hn => H m hm n hn⟩
#align map₂_le map₂_le
map₂_flip:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem map₂_flip (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (p : Submodule R M) (q : Submodule R N) :
    map₂ f.flip q p = map₂ f p q :=
  by
  rw [map₂_eq_span_image2, map₂_eq_span_image2, Set.image2_swap]
  rfl
#align map₂_flip map₂_flip
map₂_eq_span_image2:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/

theorem map₂_eq_span_image2 (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (p : Submodule R M) (q : Submodule R N) :
    map₂ f p q = span R (Set.image2 (fun m n => f m n) (p : Set M) (q : Set N)) := by
  rw [← map₂_span_span, span_eq, span_eq]

@[simp]

    map₂ f p («expr⊥») = «expr⊥» :=
  eq_bot_iff.2 <|

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/

    map₂ f («expr⊥») q = «expr⊥» :=

image2_subset_map₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem image2_subset_map₂ (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) (p : Submodule R M) (q : Submodule R N) :
    Set.image2 (fun m n => f m n) (↑p : Set M) (↑q : Set N) ⊆ (↑(map₂ f p q) : Set P) :=
  by
  rintro _ ⟨i, j, hi, hj, rfl⟩
  exact apply_mem_map₂ _ hi hj

apply_mem_map₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Kenny Lau, Eric Wieser
-/
theorem apply_mem_map₂ (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » M R («expr →ₗ[ ] » N R P)) {m : M} {n : N} {p : Submodule R M}
    {q : Submodule R N} (hm : m ∈ p) (hn : n ∈ q) : f m n ∈ map₂ f p q :=
  (le_supᵢ _ ⟨m, hm⟩ : _ ≤ map₂ f p q) ⟨n, hn, rfl⟩
#align apply_mem_map₂ apply_mem_map₂
